name: Gender Equity and LGBTQ Rights
description: Recognizing the high incidence of poverty in the LGBTQ community, particularly as experienced by people of color and in rural and underserved areas, Legal Aid At Work (LAAW) works to eliminate barriers to full and equal participation in employment based on sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, gender expression, and interlocking types of oppression. Our clients include women, LGBTQ people, immigrants, military veterans, survivors of harassment and domestic and sexual violence, student-athlet
